experience.title: experience
experience.description:
02.2024–03.2025:
Junior Software Developer at DevMentors — contributed to the design and development of the DevMentors website and learning platform, and helped implement course-related features.

Data Analyst at PEKAO Bank, working in the Anti-Money Laundering team, focusing on fraud detection and risk assessment.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
Proficient in C#, .NET, ASP.NET, Git, EF Core, and Docker. Basic knowledge of Java, JavaScript, React, and HTML.

Strong understanding of Azure, PowerShell/terminal, software architecture, and architectural patterns.

Solid grasp of networking concepts, including decentralized systems such as Tor.

Fluent in English.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
Strong problem-solving abilities, fast learner, and able to quickly adapt to new project standards.

Creative, collaborative, and detail-oriented with a proactive approach to teamwork.

bio.title: bio
bio.description: I’m a 20-year-old software developer from Poland. I started coding at 16 and began working on commercial projects in early 2024.

interests.title: interests
interests.description:
I’m passionate about motorsports and enjoy driving in my free time.

I’m also an active person — I regularly go to the gym and train for triathlon.

In the IT world, I’m deeply interested in cybersecurity. My fascination with privacy and digital security began after learning about Edward Snowden’s story. Since then, I’ve explored topics like decentralization, blockchain, and anonymity networks such as Tor and I2P. I’m particularly intrigued by dVPN systems and security-focused operating systems like Tails. In the future, I want to help non-technical people protect their privacy in an increasingly surveilled digital world.

education.title: education
education.description: I graduated from the XIII Liceum Ogólnokształcące im. Leopolda Lisa-Kuli (Highschool) in Warsaw, and I’m currently studying Computer Science at PJATK (Polsko-Japońska Akademia Technik Komputerowych - Polish-Japanese Academy of Information Technology) in Warsaw.

gaming.title: gaming
gaming.description: Since childhood, I’ve been passionate about gaming. Over the years, I’ve played many popular titles, but I’ve mostly stuck with League of Legends, CS2, Assetto Corsa, Minecraft, and Cuphead. Recently, I’ve been playing less due to limited free time.

sports.title: sports
sports.description: As mentioned in my interests, I’m into sports and fitness. I regularly go to the gym and once planned to compete in a powerlifting event in 2022, but I had to withdraw due to an injury. Currently, I’m training for triathlon and plan to complete a 1/4 Ironman in July 2026.
